definition: a medical dressing consisting of a soft heated mass of meal or clay that is spread on a cloth and applied to the skin to treat inflamed areas or improve circulation etc., dress by covering with a therapeutic substance
details:
noun
- a medical dressing consisting of a soft heated mass of meal or clay that is spread on a cloth and applied to the skin to treat inflamed areas or improve circulation etc.
= synonyms: plaster
verb
- dress by covering with a therapeutic substance
= synonyms: plaster
